products.name: Spicy Tofu Spread
products.description: Creamy spicy tofu spread with a peachy color and bold flavor. Perfect for sandwiches and crackers.

products.name: Kelbone Protein Salad
products.description: High-protein white salad with visible chunks. Nutritious and filling deli salad.

products.name: Carrot Salad
products.description: Fresh chunky carrot salad with vibrant orange color. Light and refreshing.

products.name: Sandwich Spread
products.description: Creamy yellow spread with herbs. The perfect base for any sandwich.

products.name: Spicy Vegan Cheese - Regular
products.description: Creamy spicy vegan cheese spread made from plant-based ingredients. Perfect for sandwiches, crackers, and cooking. Regular size container. 100% natural, produced by Garden of Light in Dimona, Israel.

products.name: Cashew Sliced Cheese
products.description: Orange vegan cheese block made from cashews. Perfect for slicing and melting.

products.name: Vegan Tartar Sauce
products.description: Creamy white tartar sauce with herbs. Perfect companion for any dish.

products.name: Assorted Vegan Chocolates
products.description: Premium assorted vegan chocolates. Multiple box designs with various flavors including dark, milk-style, and specialty chocolates. All plant-based ingredients.

products.name: Spicy Vegan Cheese - Large
products.description: Creamy spicy vegan cheese spread in a large container. Same great taste as our regular size, perfect for families or frequent users. 100% natural, produced by Garden of Light in Dimona, Israel.
